missionComparisonMatrix.mission: Our mission is to enable a safer, greener and more connected future of mobility by delivering the advanced technology solutions that are transforming the automotive industry.
To provide safe, sustainable, and exciting mobility solutions.
To create a better tomorrow by offering safe, intelligent and sustainable mobility solutions.
To create new value by connecting technologies and people, contributing to a better world.
To be a leading technology partner for our customers by providing intelligent automotive solutions that enhance efficiency, safety, and connectivity.
To improve people’s lives through innovative technology and a commitment to our communities.
To be a global leader in automotive technology, and a trusted partner for our customers, by delivering superior innovation, quality and value.
To be the partner of choice for automotive innovation, delivering world-class manufacturing and engineering solutions that shape the future of mobility.
To anticipate future trends in mobility and provide innovative solutions that make it safer, more intuitive and more sustainable.
To provide innovative and sustainable mobility solutions that make vehicles see, think and act.

visionComparisonMatrix.vision: A world with zero accidents, zero emissions, and a seamless experience for all.
Vision Zero: We envision a world of mobility that is free of accidents, emissions, and stress.
We shape the future of mobility.
A 'well-being society' where everyone can live with peace of mind.
To be the leading innovator in automotive lighting, electronics and lifecycle solutions.
To be a global technology company recognized for innovative products that make people's lives better and safer.
A global society with safe, smart, and sustainable mobility.
To create a world of better mobility.
We are architects of mobility's software-defined future.
Next Generation Mobility: We are building the technologies of tomorrow, today.

purposeComparisonMatrix.purpose: To enable the future of mobility.
We are powering the mobility revolution.
We power the connected and automated vehicle.
To create new value by contributing to a society with peace of mind.
To be a trusted partner in the mobility revolution.
To provide innovative technology that makes lives better and safer.
To make every drive better, smarter, and more sustainable.
To shape the future of mobility.
We are revolutionizing mobility through innovation and technology.
To drive the next generation of mobility through our passion for technology and innovation.

positioningStatementCards.positioningStatement: Aptiv is the technology partner that helps OEMs master the transition to Software-Defined Vehicles by providing the scalable and intelligent 'nervous system' for tomorrow's mobility.
Bosch is the orchestrator of the mobility revolution, bridging hardware and software to provide comprehensive, integrated solutions for a safer, cleaner, and more efficient future.
Continental is the assured, pragmatic expert powering the connected and automated vehicle, providing a safe, reliable, and intelligent foundation for the future of mobility.
DENSO is the trusted partner that connects technology and well-being, providing reliable and innovative systems that enable a safe and secure society for everyone.
FORVIA HELLA is the forward-looking technology partner that provides intelligent lighting and electronics solutions to drive the transformation towards a sustainable and digital future.
Gentex is the human-centric innovator and 'Creator' of smart technologies that enhance safety and improve lives by making everyday experiences better and more intuitive.
Lear is the partner for 'E-Systems' and 'Seating' that delivers operational excellence, sustainable innovation, and superior value to make every drive better, smarter, and more comfortable.

Magna International is the 'Creator' of a better world of mobility, leveraging our broad portfolio and global scale to provide innovative manufacturing and engineering solutions that 'shape the future of mobility.'
Valeo is the architect of a software-defined future, providing a full range of electrification, automation and digitalization solutions to create an intuitive and sustainable mobility experience.
ZF is the visionary technology leader that is building the 'Next Generation Mobility' by providing integrated chassis, powertrain, and software solutions that make vehicles see, think, and act.

brandPromiseDisplay.promise: To be the leading orchestrator of the mobility revolution.
To be a trusted partner for connected and automated mobility.
To create new value by connecting technologies and people.
To create a cleaner, safer, smarter mobility experience.
To make people’s lives better and safer.
To shape the future of mobility.
To enable the next generation of mobility.

taglineGallery.tagline: The future of mobility is here.
A better life, a better world.
Smart technology for a new era of mobility.
